@FrasSmith And still was much later. So forced quit it, unplugged drive, plugged it in again and it seemed intact. Kinda saved.

@FrasSmith Also.... why the hell does it even allow converting a Time Machine drive if it stop sit being a Time Machine drive?

iMac has finished updating. Just doing the last few "during first login" things and I should be all good. Then check fs upgrade option.
@FrasSmith Yup, just did that. Said it was about 20 minutes to go. About 5 minutes later and it's a progress bar with no text.
macOS upgrade has gone from "About 32 minutes remaining" to this... https://t.co/kgoy6wDFlT
@FrasSmith Oh! It's dropped to 38 minutes now!
iMac update has been saying "About 43 minutes remaining" for about 20 minutes now. Quality Apple work right there.
@FrasSmith I'll happily take slow if it means "works".
@FrasSmith HS is going on the iMac right now. Should know for sure in an hour or so.
Macbook updated. https://t.co/SRffco1vOO
Macbook is still upgrading. Left it doing its thing while doing the school and @0rangelic run. Hurry up!
